channel.title: admin on Anthony Kevins
channel.description: Recent content in admin on Anthony Kevins

item.description: I’m a political scientist interested in the interplay between public opinion, policy-making processes, and government legislation. Some of the questions I’ve explored in my research include: How can we best understand social policy preferences? What factors drive welfare state reform? And why do some citizens want certain groups to have more or less policy influence than others? My studies have been published in journals such as Political Behavior, Political Psychology, and Socio-Economic Review.
